haxegui

haxegui.managers.StyleManager

type
class
implements
Dynamic
available in
flash9
StyleManager handles running scripts for styling controls

Static Variables

public styles : Hash<Xml>

Static Methods

public loadStyles(xml : Xml) : Void

Loads all styles from the given Xml file.

public setStyle(name : String) : Void

parameters
name Name of style
Set the style to a loaded style by name. The style must have been loaded with loadStyles, or compiled in as default. If the style does not exist, then no change will occur.
